vote.title: A public hearing, pursuant to Chapter 26 of the Texas Parks and Wildlife Code, to receive comments on the proposed use of a portion of Glendale Park, totaling approximately 147,692 square feet (3.40 acres) of land, located at 1515 East Ledbetter Drive, by Dallas Water Utilities for the construction of a 72-inch wastewater line to replace the existing wastewater line; and, at the close of the public hearing, consideration of a resolution authorizing the proposed use of parkland pursuant to Chapter 26 of the Texas Parks and Wildlife Code - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
